description: T.2 Purple Plum - Fell (protected by Conservation Area not TPO - No Objection).T.3 Cypress Sever Ivy and trim back from over pavement (protected by Conservation Area not TPO - No Objection).T.5 Holm Oak - Reduce height by 1m to suitable growth points & shape into crown.T.6 Acacia - 2m Holistic crown reshape & deadwood (protected by Conservation Area not TPO - No Objection).T.7 Yew - 2m Holistic crown reshape.T.10 Mulberry - Rebalance by 2m on weighted side of canopy.T.11 Oak - 3m lateral reduction of 4 x low limbs overhanging neighbours, 2m Holistic crown reshape of remaining crown & deadwood (all cuts to suitable growth points).T.13 Cypress - Fell (protected by Conservation Area not TPO - No Objection).T.15 Fallen Holly - Remove (protected by Conservation Area not TPO - No Objection).
